Package ristretto.jmltools.clustering

Class ELBG

  • java.lang.Object
    • ristretto.jmltools.clustering.LBG
      • ristretto.jmltools.clustering.ELBG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.sf.javaml.clustering.Clusterer
    public class ELBG
extends LBG
    Implements the ELBG algorithm [1]

    [1] G. Patanè and M. Russo. The Enhanced-LBG Algorithm, Neural Networks, 14(9):1219-1237, 2001. https://doi.org/10.1016/S0893-6080(01)00104-6

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ELBG()
      Constructs a default ELBG clusterer with 4 clusters, a stop criterion of 1e-4, a default random generator and using the Euclidean distance.
      ELBG​(int numberOfClusters)
      Constructs a default ELBG clusterer with the specified number of clusters, a stop criterion of 1e-4, a default random generator and using the Euclidean distance.
      ELBG​(int clusters, double stopCriterion)
      Create a new ELBG clusterer with the given number of clusters and stop criterion.
      ELBG​(int clusters, double stopCriterion, net.sf.javaml.distance.DistanceMeasure dm)
      Create a new ELBG clusterer with the given number of clusters, stop criterion and distance measure.
      ELBG​(int clusters, net.sf.javaml.distance.DistanceMeasure dm)
      Create a new ELBG clusterer with the given number of clusters and distance measure.

      • utilities

        protected double[] utilities
        Utility of each cluster

    • Constructor Detail

      • ELBG

        public ELBG()
        Constructs a default ELBG clusterer with 4 clusters, a stop criterion of 1e-4, a default random generator and using the Euclidean distance.

      • ELBG

        public ELBG​(int numberOfClusters)
        Constructs a default ELBG clusterer with the specified number of clusters, a stop criterion of 1e-4, a default random generator and using the Euclidean distance.
        Parameters:
        numberOfClusters - The number of clusters to create

      • ELBG

        public ELBG​(int clusters,
            double stopCriterion)
        Create a new ELBG clusterer with the given number of clusters and stop criterion. The internal random generator is a new one based upon the current system time. For the distance we use the Euclidean n-space distance.
        Parameters:
        clusters - The number of clusters
        stopCriterion - The stop criterion

      • ELBG

        public ELBG​(int clusters,
            net.sf.javaml.distance.DistanceMeasure dm)
        Create a new ELBG clusterer with the given number of clusters and distance measure. The internal random generator is a new one based upon the current system time.
        Parameters:
        clusters - The number of clusters
        dm - The distance measure to use

      • ELBG

        public ELBG​(int clusters,
            double stopCriterion,
            net.sf.javaml.distance.DistanceMeasure dm)
        Create a new ELBG clusterer with the given number of clusters, stop criterion and distance measure. The internal random generator is a new one based upon the current system time.
        Parameters:
        clusters - The number of clusters
        stopCriterion - The stop criterion
        dm - The distance measure to use

    • Method Detail

      • partition

        protected double partition​(net.sf.javaml.core.Dataset data)
        Partitions the data according to the centroids. Modifies the assignment and utilities arrays.
        Overrides:
        partition in class LBG
        Parameters:
        data - Data set to cluster
        Returns:
        The mean distortion

      • updateUtilities

        protected void updateUtilities​(double meanDistortion)
        Update the utility of each cluster
        Parameters:
        meanDistortion - The mean distortion of the partition

      • elbgBlock

        protected void elbgBlock()
        Tries to migrate all the prototypes with an utility lower than one. Migrations will be confirmed only if the total distortion is lowered

      • cluster

        public net.sf.javaml.core.Dataset[] cluster​(net.sf.javaml.core.Dataset data)
        Execute the ELBG clustering algorithm on the data set that is provided.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        cluster in class LBG
        Parameters:
        data - Data set to cluster
